TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ChangeInterceptorAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class ChangeInterceptorAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class ChangeInterceptorAttribute sealed : Attribute

Docs.summary: The on a method is used to process updates on the specified entity set name.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Resource-level change authorization and validation is implemented by methods annotated on the <xref:System.Data.Services.ChangeInterceptorAttribute>. [!INCLUDE[ssAstoria](~/includes/ssastoria-md.md)] provides the infrastructure required for service developers to write per-entity change processing rules and validation.
Entity-level access control and validation can be enforced through query interceptors. For more information, see <xref:System.Data.Services.QueryInterceptorAttribute>.
-
## Examples For more information, see the example in the <xref:System.Data.Services.QueryInterceptorAttribute> topic.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string entitySetName) cil managed

Docs.param: The name of the entity set that contains the entity to which the interceptor applies.
Docs.summary: Creates a new change interceptor for an entity set specified by the parameter .

public: property System::String ^ EntitySetName { System::String ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

Docs.summary: Gets the name of the entity set to which the interceptor applies.
